Module methanol
Package com.github.mizosoft.methanol

Class MoreBodyHandlers

java.lang.Object
com.github.mizosoft.methanol.MoreBodyHandlers
public class MoreBodyHandlers extends Object
Provides additional HttpResponse.BodyHandler implementations.

  • Method Details

    • fromAsyncSubscriber

      public static <T,​ S extends Flow.Subscriber<? super List<ByteBuffer>>> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> fromAsyncSubscriber​(S downstream, Function<? super S,​? extends CompletionStage<T>> asyncFinisher)
      Returns a BodyHandler that handles the response with the subscriber returned by MoreBodySubscribers.fromAsyncSubscriber(Subscriber, Function).
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the body
      S - the type of the subscriber
      Parameters:
      downstream - the receiver of the response body
      asyncFinisher - a function that maps the subscriber to an async task upon which the body completion is dependant

    • withReadTimeout

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> withReadTimeout​(HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> baseHandler, Duration timeout)
      Returns a BodyHandler that handles the response with the subscriber returned by MoreBodySubscribers.withReadTimeout(BodySubscriber, Duration).

    • withReadTimeout

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> withReadTimeout​(HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> baseHandler, Duration timeout, ScheduledExecutorService scheduler)
      Returns a BodyHandler that handles the response with the subscriber returned by MoreBodySubscribers.withReadTimeout(BodySubscriber, Duration, ScheduledExecutorService).

    • ofByteChannel

      public static HttpResponse.BodyHandler<ReadableByteChannel> ofByteChannel()
      Returns a BodyHandler of ReadableByteChannel as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofByteChannel(). A response with such a handler is completed after the response headers are received.

    • ofReader

      public static HttpResponse.BodyHandler<Reader> ofReader()
      Returns a BodyHandler of Reader as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofReader(Charset) using the charset specified by the Content-Type response header for decoding the response. A response with such a handler is completed after the response headers are received.

    • ofReader

      public static HttpResponse.BodyHandler<Reader> ofReader​(Charset charset)
      Returns a BodyHandler of Reader as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofReader(Charset) using the given charset for decoding the response. A response with such a subscriber is completed after the response headers are received.
      Parameters:
      charset - the charset used for decoding the response

    • ofObject

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> ofObject​(Class<T> type)
      Returns a BodyHandler of T as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofObject(TypeRef, MediaType). The media type will be inferred from the Content-Type response header.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the response body type
      Parameters:
      type - the raw type of T
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if no Decoder that supports the given type is installed

    • ofObject

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> ofObject​(TypeRef<T> type)
      Returns a BodyHandler of T as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofObject(TypeRef, MediaType). The media type will be inferred from the Content-Type response header.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the response body type
      Parameters:
      type - a TypeRef representing T
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if no Decoder that supports the given type is installed

    • ofDeferredObject

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<Supplier<T>> ofDeferredObject​(Class<T> type)
      Returns a BodyHandler of Supplier<T> as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofDeferredObject(TypeRef, MediaType). The media type will be inferred from the Content-Type response header.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the response body type
      Parameters:
      type - the raw type of T
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if no Decoder that supports the given type is installed

    • ofDeferredObject

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<Supplier<T>> ofDeferredObject​(TypeRef<T> type)
      Returns a BodyHandler of Supplier<T> as specified by MoreBodySubscribers.ofDeferredObject(TypeRef, MediaType). The media type will be inferred from the Content-Type response header.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the response body type
      Parameters:
      type - a TypeRef representing T
      Throws:

    • decoding

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> decoding​(HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> downstreamHandler)
      Returns a BodyHandler that wraps the result of the given handler in a BodyDecoder if required. The decoder is created using the factory corresponding to the value of the Content-Type header, throwing UnsupportedOperationException if no such factory is registered. If the header is not present, the result of the given handler is returned directly.

      The Content-Encoding and Content-Length headers are removed when invoking the given handler to avoid recursive decompression attempts or using the wrong body length.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the subscriber's body type
      Parameters:
      downstreamHandler - the handler returning the downstream

    • decoding

      public static <T> HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> decoding​(HttpResponse.BodyHandler<T> downstreamHandler, Executor executor)
      Returns a BodyHandler that wraps the result of the given handler in a BodyDecoder with the given executor if required. The decoder is created using the factory corresponding to the value of the Content-Type header, throwing UnsupportedOperationException if no such factory is registered. If the header is not present, the result of the given handler is returned directly.

      The Content-Encoding and Content-Length headers are removed when invoking the given handler to avoid recursive decompression attempts or using the wrong body length.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the subscriber's body type
      Parameters:
      downstreamHandler - the handler returning the downstream
      executor - the executor used to supply downstream items
